mapper.select: SELECT t1.id, t1.org_name AS orgName, t1.org_code AS orgCode, t1.remark, t1.isvalid, t1.ctime, t1.creater, t1.mtime, t1.updater, CASE WHEN t2.user_id IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE 1 END AS isAssigned FROM sys_organization t1 LEFT JOIN sys_user_organization t2 ON t2.isvalid = 1 AND t2.org_id = t1.id AND t2.user_id = #{userId} WHERE t1.isvalid = 1
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO sys_user_organization(org_id, user_id, remark, isvalid, ctime, creater, mtime, updater) VALUES
(#{item.orgId}, #{item.userId}, #{item.remark}, 1, now(), #{item.creater}, now(), #{item.updater})
